text: (Aey Muhammad, inhein us din se khabardar kardo) jabke hum har ummat mein khud usi ke andar se ek gawaah utha khada karenge jo uske muqable mein shahadat (witness/gawahi) dega. Aur in logon ke muqable mein shahadat dene ke liye hum tumhein layenge aur (yeh usi shadat ki tayyari hai ke) humne yeh kitab tumpar nazil kardi hai jo har cheez ki saaf saaf wazahat karne wali hai aur hidayat o rehmat aur basharat hai un logon ke liye jinhon ne sar-e-tasleem kham kar diya hai
